title: Beyond the Mask. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: June 5th, 2015

Description:

The leading mercenary for the British East India Company, Will Reynolds, has just been double-crossed and now is on the run in the American Colonies. Working to redeem his name and win back the affections of the woman with whom he's never been fully truthful, Will now hides behind a new mask in hopes of thwarting his former employer.
